lead_paragraph: Promotions featuring 360-degree videos have become an increasingly popular way for travel companies and tourism boards to entice clients.

headline.main: Before You Take the Trip: How About a Virtual ‘Test Drive’?
headline.print_headline: A Virtual Trip Before, or Instead of, Real Travel
